mapper.select: select Withdrawal_rate_2g,Withdrawal_rate_4g,complete_Timely_rate,form_Compliance_rate,one_Passing_rate,Utilization_rate,Attendance_rate,Upper_station_rate,Frontline_rate from PM_GFS_INDICATE_DAY where FGS= #{name} and to_days(TIME) = to_days(#{time})
select * from PM_GFS_INDICATE_DAY where FGS=#{name} and to_days(TIME) = to_days(#{time})
select * from PM_GFS_INDICATE_DAY_T where FGS=#{name} and to_days(TIME) = to_days(#{time})
select ${name},time TIME from PM_GFS_INDICATE_DAY where fgs = '${city}' and time between #{endTime} and #{startTime} order by time
select ${name},FGS from PM_GFS_INDICATE_DAY where to_days(TIME) = to_days(#{time})
select ${columnName} from ${tableName} where FGS =#{city} and to_days(TIME) = to_days(#{time})
